AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Brignoni-Ponce Jacquinot: defendant who pleaded guilty to possession with intent to distribute marijuana, arguing that the stop of his vehicle was unjustified
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. District Court: court that denied Brignoni-Ponce Jacquinot's motion to suppress and upheld the two-level adjustment for possession of a dangerous weapon
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States/Mexican Border Patrol: agency whose agents followed the large white Ford pickup truck and observed its suspicious behavior, including a five-second pause at a stop sign
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.large white Ford pickup truck: vehicle stopped by United States/Mexican Border Patrol agents due to suspicious behavior, containing marijuana and two unloaded handguns
